description: Numbers n such that n remains prime through 3 iterations of function f(x) = 2x + 7.
comments: n, 2*n+7, 4*n+21 and 8*n+49 are primes. [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..100000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(2*n+7) and IsPrime(4*n+21) and IsPrime(8*n+49)] [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
author: _David W. Wilson_
